markdownRemark.html:
I pursue to be a staff engineer equipped with both expertise and entrepreneurship traits.

Hi there! Andreson is here with 4+ years of product development experience. My participation in constructing both Android and Web products from scratch solidified my capacity to provide user-centered solutions. I adopted the MVVM software architecture in Android and implemented the server-side-rendering framework of Next.js on the web, and both successfully delivered a better user experience. The practice of releasing one hybrid Android App and two webs formed my technical and commercial comprehension. It empowered me to represent my company for over three fundraising business pitches. I expect myself not only to be a tech professional but a practitioner with entrepreneurship.

Skills

    • Pug
    • Sass
    • TypeScript

  2. React.js Ecosystem

    • Redux
    • Redux-Saga
    • Reselect
    • Styled-Components
    • Styled-System
    • React Hooks API
    • Apollo GraphQL
    • Next.js (v8-v11)

  3. Android Ecosystem

    • Android Architecture Component(MVVM)
    • LiveData
    • Room
    • Retrofit2
    • RxJava2
    • Dagger2

  4. Node.js

    • Express.js
    • Koa.js
    • Nest.js

  5. CI&CD

    • GitFlow

    • Docker

  6. Management
